Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLI, GUI
public abstract class View
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible of orchestrating all the functionalities of the game interface.

    • handlePlayerConnect

      public void handlePlayerConnect​(java.lang.String playerName, int currentPlayers, int playersToStart, java.util.List<java.lang.String> otherConnectedPlayers)
      Handles the connection of an other player to the lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player that connected
      currentPlayers - the amount of players connected to the lobby
      playersToStart - the number of players required to start the game
      otherConnectedPlayers - the list of the other connected player names

    • handleSetPlayersToStart

    • handlePlayerDisconnect

      public abstract void handlePlayerDisconnect​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Handles the disconnection of one of the other players from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player that disconnected

    • handleGameStart

      public void handleGameStart​(GameConfig gameConfig)
      Handles the game start.
      Parameters:
      gameConfig - the game config used for this game

    • handlePlayerCrash

      public abstract void handlePlayerCrash​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Handles the disconnection of one of the other players, terminating the game.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player that disconnected

    • handleInvalidAction

      public void handleInvalidAction​(java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Handles an invalid action done by this client.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - error message given by the server

    • handleEndGame

      public abstract void handleEndGame​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> scores, java.lang.String winnerName)
      Handles the ending of the game.
      Parameters:
      scores - a map associating usernames with their scores
      winnerName - the username of the winner

    • handleEndSingleplayerGame

      public abstract void handleEndSingleplayerGame​(boolean lorenzoWin, java.lang.String loseReason, int playerScore)
      Handles the ending of the singleplayer game.
      Parameters:
      lorenzoWin - true if the opponent has won the game, false otherwise
      loseReason - the reason of the defeat, may be null
      playerScore - the score of the player, valid only if lorenzoWin is false

    • reset

      protected void reset()
      Resets the View to the pre game state.
